metadata.title: RA Family: What types of microphones are provided on the board ?

sections.content:
Question:
What types of microphones are provided on the board ?
Answer:
Each VOICE kit provides up to 2 analog microphones and up to one digital microphone.
Suitable Products
RA4E1, RA6E1
